title: Google Details The Fixes Contained In The September Round Of Security Updates …
text: DID YOU KNOW THIS: Google Google Inc. is an American multinational public corporation invested in Internet search, cloud computing, and advertising technologies. Google hosts and develops a number of Internet-based services and products, and generates profit primarily from advertising through its AdWords program. The company was founded by Larry Page and Sergey Brin, often dubbed the Details Details is an American monthly men's magazine published by Cond Nast Publications, founded in 1982. Though primarily a magazine devoted to fashion and lifestyle, Details also features reports on relevant social and political issues. nAlan Patricof bought the magazine in 1987. Cond Nast bought the magazine a year later for $2 million. Its current format stems from an October 2000, relaunch of the title, following a transfer of the magazine from Cond Nast to sibling division Fairchild Publications. nBetween its last issue at Cond Nast and first at Fairchild, publication of Details was temporarily suspended. This allowed for extensive redesign and strategic repositioning of the magazine. ... This
